title: Can I publish an eBook using KDP if I live in UAE? And if so, what are the requirements? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes! you definitely can. The requirements and guidelines are pretty much the same for anyone who wants to publish with Amazon’s KDP. You can refer to this link on how to get started with publishing your book :  If you are still unclear and need more clarification, you can checkout the KDP Help Center Home that provides a lot of information that might be more in line with what you’re looking for. Hope this helps and All the very best on your writing journey! :)
